profile:
Standing above the roofline, chimneys are fully exposed to rain and snow and are affected by winter's freeze/thaw cycles. They are therefore one of the first places on a house to deteriorate.  This deterioration usually takes many years to begin but then progresses rapidly.  Cracked or spalled bricks, damaged flue tiles or concrete caps, or a leaning structure are signs that the chimney needs immediate attention.
 
Top Hat Chimney specializes in all aspects of chimney repair and rebuilding.  Our brick masons are unsurpassed in their level of expertise, and take pride in their workmanship.   They take great care to protect the roof and ground so that all work will be completed in a clean and safe manner.
 
All of our work is guaranteed against defect in materials and workmanship.
 
We are happy to provide references from other satisfied customers in your area.
 
The burning of wood leaves highly flammable deposits in the chimney flue and smoke chamber.  Regular cleaning and inspection are essential in the prevention of chimney fires.
 
All of our expert technicians are WETT certified and employ the most up-to-date chimney cleaning techniques. Care is always taken to insure that there is no mess in the home.
 
A basic chimney sweep includes :
 
- cleaning of the chimney flue, smoke chamber, and smoke shelf
- damper adjustment
- basic  inspection.
 
Also Available :
 
- nest and blockage removal
- detailed WETT reports
- chimney caps and accesories
- special rates for multi-unit properties

Brian's Masonry

Practice What We Preach
